title: Preserving His Truth
description: BastianI've kept my distance from women for years. They have no power over me other than a few minutes of physical satisfaction. Until she walks into my bar. She doesn't belong here. That much is apparent. She is a princess that belongs in a castle. Not waiting tables on the bar side of a strip club.Her mere presence pisses me off. She is a distraction that I don't want or need. But I can't get her out of my head.The truth is, I don't want to.VerityI am running from my family and the man I left at the alter. I want a new start. A fresh one away from the hell I've lived.The last thing I expected was Sebastian Delrie. He hates me, and gets off on tormenting me.But as hard as I fight it, I can't escape the truth. This man is exactly what I need.
author: Nola Marie
